messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, BarbaraSheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> No need to spend $100 you find it and a whole bunch of other
Japanese
> shows really cheap if you check out this person on Jdorama.com

>
> Note in their list of things they have Shinsengumi!
> and
> Shinsengumi (no !)
>

> current NHK series the other is in fact Shinsengumi Keppuroku
>
> --
> Barbara Sheridan
> http://www.barbarasheridan.net

ahhhh thanks so much! yay now i dont have to spend $100 ::sniff
sniff:: im soo happy now!!

messages.msgSnippet: The person on Jdorama has episode 1-10 of the current NHK Shinsengumi!...so if you are interested in seeing Saitou then you won t be disappointed because he
messages.messageBody:
The person on Jdorama has episode 1-10 of the current NHK
Shinsengumi!...so if you are interested in seeing Saitou then you
won't be disappointed because he shows up in these episodes...

Shinsengumi! title...
Anyone else put off by the opera title "La LA...La la la Laaaah!"
I do like them running into the gate...it looks like they are being
enshrined.

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Shinsengumi Keppuroku
messages.msgSnippet: No need to spend $100 you find it and a whole bunch of other Japanese shows really cheap  if you check out this person on Jdorama.com
messages.messageBody:
No need to spend $100 you find it and a whole bunch of other Japanese
shows really cheap if you check out this person on Jdorama.com

http://www.jdorama.com/viewtopic_2706.htm

Note in their list of things they have Shinsengumi!
and
Shinsengumi (no !)

The one with the exclamation point (!) is beginning episodes of the
current NHK series the other is in fact Shinsengumi Keppuroku

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
